ai-ja221:1.1_0: One who, not free of stains themselves,
ai-ja221:1.2_0: would wear the robe stained in ocher,
ai-ja221:1.4_0: they are not worthy of the ocher robe.
ai-ja221:2.1_0: One who’s purged all their stains,
ai-ja221:2.2_0: and you are steady in ethics,
ai-ja221:3.1_0: First they go to the ocher robe.
